Um, the bottom set kind of remind me of zombie flesh. Could just be me though...

Thinking about updating all the parts with textures and normals. What do you guys think?

I started remaking the pack with newer more optimized meshes and textures and normal maps and stuff , but I sort of lost interest in this since it was just making it prettier and not really adding anything new. I'll try to get working on it again.

The assets in the pack are not really set up for any textures, I never did proper UVs since the parts were just experimental test things. But I appreciate your attempt at making them look better.

Unfortunately this will mean that the assets will be in .mu format and not work with retexture mods unless the texturer is willing to work with the unity editor.

Hi mols14, source code is the code that was compiled to make the plugin used by the add-on

I'm having a bit of a dilemma here:

what I did was I copied the rotatron part, and in the copied part I edited the rescale value in the .CFG so the new part would be half the size of the old one (0.50)

the picture shows the newer smaller rotatron on the bottom and the original on the top.

as you can see the rescale did not affect the model, what can be done to fix this?

uploaded my resize cfg edit and new textures here;

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19056-Mods-Cfg-Edits-That-Don-t-Deserve-a-Thread?p=257024#post257024

Um...

I have trouble using door hinges. Do they auto-orient which side moves or what?

I want to make wings that fold downwards, like this:

|_| to _ _ _

But I end up getting this:

|_| to X

Edited September 12, 2012 by T-Pilot395

With the door hinges in particular mirroring is very messed up. what i do is place each hinge separately, which take a bit of work to get them to line up properly. The darker side of the hinge is the moving side, the lighter side is the base. the hinge folds in the direction that the middle extruded part is facing, if that makes sense.

so if this _o_ is the hinge and the left flat area is the base the right flat area will rotate counter clockwise until the hinge is closed like this =o

I started remaking the pack with newer more optimized meshes and textures and normal maps and stuff , but I sort of lost interest in this since it was just making it prettier and not really adding anything new. I'll try to get working on it again.

The assets in the pack are not really set up for any textures, I never did proper UVs since the parts were just experimental test things. But I appreciate your attempt at making them look better.

Unfortunately this will mean that the assets will be in .mu format and not work with retexture mods unless the texturer is willing to work with the unity editor.

this is realy cool mod.. adding robotic parts to rovers, satellites amazing......its absolutely deserve to work on it for at least bug fixes and some basic new parts would be awsome i think.

for a idea it may have manual record option of animation... for deploy retract, walk or for robotic arms wich placing servos at same group doesnt work situations... or like laser guided working donno so much things

and also another bug report maybe it reported before; looks like they bugging their animation range when leaving craft and turning back for example hinges turnin in one side with 120-180c insted of 90c each side... :Z

btw heres my first rover With robotic arms lol im just imagining laser guide atm

hey maybe some micro map sat like modes came for some kind of spectrometer mod or we may put some microscobe/telescope like thingys on them at 0.17 or future
